text: "You Little Thief" is a 1985 song by Northern Irish singer Feargal Sharkey and is the second single from his debut studio album Feargal Sharkey. It went to number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 4 in Australia, number 3 in Ireland, number 38 in New Zealand, number 10 in the Netherlands and number 30 in Germany. ==Formats== ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:Feargal Sharkey songs
title: You Little Thief
